thread.title: Eagles to train at ‘The Hive’ for Senegal, Burkina Faso
thread.title_full: Eagles to train at ‘The Hive’ for Senegal, Burkina Faso

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Eagles to train at ‘The Hive’ for Senegal, Burkina Faso
text:
Home » Sports » Eagles to train at ‘The Hive’ for Senegal, Burkina Faso Eagles to train at ‘The Hive’ for Senegal, Burkina Faso On 
The national team will start training for their eagerly anticipated friendlies on Monday, March 20, same day the Nigerian Federation have instructed the invited players to arrive at Crowne Plaza Hotel Ealing. super eagles 
Ahead of their first game of 2017, the Super Eagles will train at Barnet’s training ground, otherwise known as The Hive. 
The training center located at Canons Park, London has a gym and medical center. 
Ikechukwu Ezenwa, who is the only domestic-based player in the 25-man roster, will also start training with the squad at the start of preparations as he is expected to arrive in London along with coaches Salisu Yusuf, Imama Amapakabo and Alloy Agu on March 20. 
After the game with Senegal on March 23, another friendly game awaits the Super Eagles against Burkina Faso on March 27.
